  "description": "While acknowledging the irreplaceable expertise of clinicians, Insight plus Healthcare, a leading healthcare service provider in Nigeria, is committed to supporting doctors in achieving more precise diagnoses. Through our collaboration with physicians, we ensure accurate diagnoses and effective treatment for patients.

Located in Lagos, Nigeria, Insightplus Healthcare is dedicated to delivering top-notch diagnostics with rapid turnaround times, meeting international standards through our Imaging and Laboratory services. Our focus is on delivering unique and precise results through our automated laboratory services and cutting-edge imaging technologies like DR X-rays, Multi-slice CT Scans, and Modern Ultrasonography. This underscores our ongoing dedication to promoting good health for our clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Ogudu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are seeking an experienced and proactive Marketing Executive with a strong understanding of the hospital system and healthcare service dynamics.
	The ideal candidate will drive patient engagement, build corporate relationships, and increase patronage for our diagnostic centre.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and pursue new business opportunities with hospitals, clinics, and corporate organizations.
	Build and maintain strong referral networks with medical professionals and institutions.
	Develop marketing strategies to grow visibility and client base.
	Conduct outreach visits and manage on-ground marketing activities.
	Monitor market trends, competitors, and opportunities within the healthcare sector.
	Prepare and submit periodic reports on marketing performance.


Requirements


	HND / B.Sc Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field.
	2&ndash;4 years of proven marketing experience (preferably in a hospital, diagnostic centre, or healthcare organization).
	Strong understanding of healthcare operations and patient referral systems.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and relationship-building skills.
	Self-motivated, result-oriented, and able to work independently.


Remuneration
N150,000- N180,000 Monthly plus performance-based incentives.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;pmc1recruits@gmail.com&nbsp;using &quot;Marketin Executive&quot; as subject of the mail.",

This underscores our ongoing dedication to promoting good health for our clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

	We are seeking an experienced and proactive Marketing Executive with a strong understanding of the hospital system and healthcare service dynamics.
